Hi Kris,

Read through your proposal and it looks good to me.  Sounds like =
it
would provide the functionality that we want.  I know you're all busy
wi=
th the 1.0.0 release at the moment, but I was wondering what the
current st=
atus and progress is with this feature?  

On a different topic, will the 1=
.0.0 release support checkpointing?

Rob Eger
Aptas, Inc.
